summary.span: 命名空间提供基于角色的编程模型，用以支持粗粒度数据流和流水线操作任务的进程内消息传递。

span.span: The namespace provides an actor-based programming model that supports in-process message passing for coarse-grained dataflow and pipelining tasks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [tpl-install-instructions](~/includes/tpl-install-instructions.md)] 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据流](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/dataflow-task-parallel-library.md)。For more information, see [Dataflow](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/dataflow-task-parallel-library.md).
